steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(3), number_in_box(3), put_result_into_box(9)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(2), then_go_to_step(6)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(9)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(3)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(5)),
Put(number_in_box(6), into_box(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 9?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在9号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 3 ) * ( number in box 3 ), put result into box 9.
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 9
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 3 )
Put ( number in box 6 ) into box 2
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
